a.t-attf-style: background-color:{{submenu.hlt_menu_bg_color if submenu.hlt_menu else '' }};color:{{submenu.hlt_menu_ft_col if submenu.hlt_menu else ''}} !important
background-color:{{submenu.hlt_menu_bg_color if submenu.hlt_menu else '' }};color:{{submenu.hlt_menu_ft_col if submenu.hlt_menu else ''}} !important

li.t-nocache: Profile session and user group can change unrelated to parent caches.

div.t-attf-class: clearfix oe_login_buttons text-center mb-1 {{'pt-2' if form_small else 'pt-3'}}

input.name: name
input.t-att-autofocus: 'autofocus' if login and not only_passwords else None

template.name: Theme Alan Comparator - Product row in comparator popover
Theme Alan Dynamic Product Filter Price

xpath.attribute: (not website.prevent_zero_price_sale or record_price) and not (website.env.user._is_public() and website.active_b2b_mode)

template.name: Theme Alan Single any Search Results

div.p: You have items item in your cart

input.t-attf-class: js_quantity form-control quantity p-1 text-center sale_line_#{line.product_id.id}
input.t-att-value: int(line.product_uom_qty) == line.product_uom_qty and int(line.product_uom_qty) or line.product_uom_qty

a.class: btn btn-link float_left js_add_cart_json d-none d-md-inline-block
a.title: Add one
